shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function. The keyboardOpening event is triggered when the virtual keyboard is toggled to slide into view of the application.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the keyboardOpening event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

                function onKeyboardOpening() {
                    console.log("Keyboard opening event occured.");
                }

                document.addEventListener("keyboardOpening", onKeyboardOpening);

                </script>
